newsitem.title: BULGARIA: Bulgaria lev closes firmer at 197.80-198.50 to dlr.
newsitem.headline: Bulgaria lev closes firmer at 197.80-198.50 to dlr.

text.p: The Bulgarian lev closed between 197.80 and 198.50 per dollar, above the opening at 198.20-199.00 and the previous close at 198.60/80, supported by a rise in dollar supply on the interbank market, dealers said.
"Trade was much calmer than yesterday because there were more dollars on offer but relatively small volumes changed hands," a bank dealer said.
Several big banks and the central bank are said to have offered dollars in the market, gradually lowering their asking rate from 198.50 to 197.80 levs per dollar, traders said.
Bulgarian National Bank officials said the bank bid for small amounts of dollars throughout the day and sold foreign currency mainly to final clients.
The lev was expected to ease again on Thursday because of the longer value date of spot deals, traders said. -- Dessislava Popova, Sofia Newsroom, (++359-2) 981 8569
